definition: to release/to issue/to announce/to distribute/also written 發布|发布[fa1 bu4]
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: Mr. Gong on Zhongguancun domestically produced software press conference.
sentences.chinese: 在中關村“國產軟件一樣好用”發佈會上。

sentences.english: Saved the meteorological observatory evening to issue the Zhejiang coastal area strong typhoon urgent alarm yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 省氣象臺昨天傍晚發佈浙江沿海地區強颱風緊急警報。

sentences.english: Will Microsoft open testing sign-ups again when RC1 is released?
sentences.chinese: 微軟是否會再RC1發佈時打開測試註冊嗎？

sentences.english: Remuneration will be give to the writers within one month after the article is officially published.
sentences.chinese: 文章稿酬在稿件正式發佈後一個月內發放。

sentences.english: Wikileaks.org, which published the documents, won't reveal its source.
sentences.chinese: org作爲發佈這些文件的網站，不願透露其來源。

sentences.english: And those same people post to the positive articles, too, and call everyone fanboys.
sentences.chinese: 那些發佈積極文章的人們，叫每個人粉絲。

sentences.english: As usual, the code will be released under an open source license.
sentences.chinese: 照常，代碼將遵循開放源碼許可證發佈。

sentences.english: It is a competing format to Dolby Digital which was released about a year after.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個稍後一年發佈具有競爭力的杜比數字格式。

sentences.english: We're really on a multi-release pathway to help developers write concurrent applications.
sentences.chinese: 我們通過多種發佈途徑幫助開發者編寫並行應用。

sentences.english: Ha ha. I bet they play this and then announce the event is over.
sentences.chinese: 哈，我打包票他們演奏完後宣佈發佈會結束。

sentences.english: Distribution of this subtitle for commercial usage is strictly prohibited.
sentences.chinese: 不得將本字幕內嵌發佈。

sentences.english: Use the stream strategy to support the granularity of distribution being undertaken.
sentences.chinese: 使用流策略支持發佈的顆粒度。

sentences.english: We use a software and send a tsunami warning.
sentences.chinese: 我們利用軟件發佈海嘯預警。

sentences.english: It reduces communication to the level of the press release.
sentences.chinese: 它把我們的交流降低到發佈發佈狀態的水平上。

sentences.english: It reduces communication to the level of the press release.
sentences.chinese: 它把我們的交流降低到發佈發佈狀態的水平上。

sentences.english: We have to release the news before 5 o'clock tomorrow morning.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須在明晨五點以前將這條新聞發佈出去。

definition: to inform/to report/to make known/report/speech/talk/lecture/CL:篇[pian1],份[fen4],個|个[ge4],通[tong4]
to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
to start (a machine)/(fig.) to set in motion/to launch (an operation)/to activate (a plan)
